main event: A sighting of 3 unidentified flying objects in Shaker Heights, Ohio on July 3, 1967.
interesting points: Witness saw what they thought was a star that turned and flew away., Witness and brother observed the UFOs around 8 p.m., The UFOs were reported to be in different colors., There was a lack of sufficient data for scientific evaluation from the Air Force., The response from the Air Force requested more detailed information.
witness description: two brothers observing the night sky
